## IToolboxItem interface

Interface for an item in the toolbox.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IToolboxItem extends IFocusableNode 
```
**Extends:** [IFocusableNode](./blockly.ifocusablenode.md)

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [dispose()](./blockly.itoolboxitem.dispose.md) | Dispose of this toolbox item. No-op by default. |
|  [getClickTarget()](./blockly.itoolboxitem.getclicktarget.md) | Gets the HTML element that is clickable. |
|  [getDiv()](./blockly.itoolboxitem.getdiv.md) | Gets the div for the toolbox item. |
|  [getId()](./blockly.itoolboxitem.getid.md) | Gets a unique identifier for this toolbox item. |
|  [getParent()](./blockly.itoolboxitem.getparent.md) | Gets the parent if the toolbox item is nested. |
|  [init()](./blockly.itoolboxitem.init.md) | Initializes the toolbox item. This includes creating the DOM and updating the state of any items based on the info object. |
|  [isCollapsible()](./blockly.itoolboxitem.iscollapsible.md) | Whether the toolbox item is collapsible. |
|  [isSelectable()](./blockly.itoolboxitem.isselectable.md) | Whether the toolbox item is selectable. |
|  [setVisible\_(isVisible)](./blockly.itoolboxitem.setvisible_.md) | Sets whether the category is visible or not. For a category to be visible its parent category must also be expanded. |
